item.title: Python with R
item.description: The only system I have used throughout my undergraduate degree has been R Studio, so I have become pretty confident in my skills using it. However, Python is a whole different story. I had never before printed “hello world” before one of the last lectures of Compuational Biology. I quickly learned though that R Studio and Python can go hand in hand as follows. You can save variables using Python chunks:
